TopicTitle: Tim Yam's Spaceliner: Habitats, Birds of Prey, Walmart Galactic and Cats in Space!

Articles.Content:
![j2VnXui.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/j2VnXui.jpg)
**Welcome to Tim Yam's Spaceliner construction yard!**

**Background:**

This thread functions as a showcase for Tim Yam's incredible adventures in the world of 3D modelling, where he has since January 2015 expressed his creativity by creating a personal vision of Kerbal future. A prosperous future where Kerbals reside in private orbital habitats, fly Klingon Birds of Prey to work, and shop at Wal-Marts in low orbit!

While curious cats pounce between star systems in search of space tuna and galactic yarn in their very own Kitty Space Program.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rfS-PGsKS_E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And, I, having for the past few months contributed to functional areas of the mod such as space cats, IVA pillows, and some aesthetics of space supermarkets, now have permission to serve as his chronicler and resident cat consultant.

---------------------------------------------------

**Project 1: Spaceliner**

![C0C003AB1334D4A5C3CDAEA203F529CB8CD782F1](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/711906876051786694/C0C003AB1334D4A5C3CDAEA203F529CB8CD782F1/)

Tim's first foray into the world of 3D modelling features the Banyan House luxury space residence and Eden geodesic resort dome in the spirit of Silent Running, complete with space lagoon and a bar!

To maintain the prodigious upkeep of a luxury space station, a Maersk Interstellar cargo hauler command section, and luxury passenger spacecraft from the far-off Kushan Empire are also provided. Some time later, Tim then released models of two Klingon-derived Birds of Prey, one following the original design from Star Trek, and another "luxury" version made more comfortable by local Kerbin shipyards. It also has iPads on the command chairs! All are included in the below link plus the one and only six-star resort with integrated space pool and bar to ever take to the skies!

Update 3 May 2015:

The **Walmart Space Supermarket** is now part of the Spaceliner pack!

**>>** 
[**Download Project 1: Spaceliner**](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/228806-spaceliner) **<<**

---------------------------------------------------

**Project 2: Meow Lander**

![eJhAtz5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/eJhAtz5.jpg)

It is said that humans (and Kerbals) don't actually own cats. The cat is the true master of all humanity. 

In the far future, humans (and Kerbals alike) made a terrible mistake of granting their pets intelligence comparable to their own by way of cybernetic implants. As shown in the

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rfS-PGsKS_E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 to this thread, this allowed cats to basically, take over the KSC with absolutely adorable results.
I mean, look at them! Intrepid feline explorers bravely setting course into the final frontier, seeking out space tuna and unraveling the secrets of intergalactic yarn... aww how adorable!

**>>** 
[**Download Project 2: Meow Lander & Scout Cat**](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/229570-the-meow-lander) **<<**

---------------------------------------------------

**Project 3: Walmart Space Supercenter**

![D20C0D9F174E4AE396EBF0685CA59B6DDE25D36C](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/719791555840651078/D20C0D9F174E4AE396EBF0685CA59B6DDE25D36C/)

![BE6415CFD58AFC28A3F0DFFFA308CED523025918](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/719791555837526104/BE6415CFD58AFC28A3F0DFFFA308CED523025918/)

**Spaceship parking is 10,000 kash per entry!** 

![B44D25799124D11C288E02BC6A47D9C74B4B1A55](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/719791555837524758/B44D25799124D11C288E02BC6A47D9C74B4B1A55/)

**For all your space shopping needs! Discount rockets at very low prices! Now with FREE IVA view!**

Featuring animated loading bays for space truckers to deliver produce, spaceship parking lots and vending machines for all your favorite snacks! IVA will consist of a scene with long rows of Kerbals and/or space cats being hopelessly delayed because only two checkout counters are open...

**Walmart Download is part of the** 
[**Spaceliner pack**](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/228806-spaceliner)**!**

Introducing a new revolution in Kerbal grocery getting! The shopping cart prevents over-eager Kerbals from dropping the milk carton while reaching for that oh-so-tempting pack of Cheetos! Just toss everything into the trolley and cruise the aisles like a boss! 

**>>** **** 
[**Download Shopping Cart**](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/229823-the-shopping-cart) **** **<<**
![m7Zp6DA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/m7Zp6DA.jpg)

**Orbital Walmart Coming soon!**

---------------------------------------------------

**Known Issues**

- [\*=left]We are aware the fuel values for some craft needs adjustment, as the fuel and oxidizer levels should be 45% and 55% respectively. This will be corrected in a later release.  
[\*=left]Newer models will feature progressively higher quality models and textures. Please be patient as Tim is learning 3D modelling as he goes! But considering how well the Kitty Space Program videos are turning out, I appreciate the sheer number of toys Tim is producing at a rate that can only be described as .... awesome!  
[\*=left]Cats have infiltrated KSP. We are doomed!

**Legal**
